project_plan.name: Python Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks their score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Set up the main structure of the quiz game
Store questions and answers in a variable
Implement the functionality to display questions and capture user answers
Implement score tracking and scoring logic
Implement the final score display functionality
Write tests for the functionality of the quiz game
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure that it functions correctly
